thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 33 of 7354
thread.title: DK

author: DK
title: DK
text:
B&H Photo always has everything I need. Lenses are always in stock and available to ship next day, and with generally with free shipping. They also have constantly in stock, special items such as filters, cases, covers etc.
As a photojournalist, sometimes you need stuff immediately. B&H Photo always has shipping options (even though not free) with prices that don't break the bank, and have never failed, but only surpassed my expectations.
As someone who is hard to please, I am very well pleased with this company and I recommend them to everyone I know; rather beginner, Intermediate, Semi-Pro, or Pro.
Keep up the great work team! Bless you guys!
DK
War Zone Photojournalist
